title: Constitutional amendments, proposed
context: [ยง11-118.5] Constitutional amendments, proposed. Any constitutional amendment proposed by the legislature shall include in final form the exact constitutional ratification question to be printed on a ballot. The constitutional ratification question shall be phrased in a manner to enable voters to express their choice on the constitutional amendment by providing a &ldquo;yes&rdquo; or &ldquo;no&rdquo; response. The language and meaning of a constitutional amendment shall be clear and it shall be neither misleading nor deceptive. [L 1996, c 173, ยง1; am L 1997, c 2, ยง17]
